hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.subtitle: Specialized in Full-Stack development with 2+ years of experience creating scalable and maintainable solutions

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a full-stack software engineer with a strong backend orientation. Specialized in scalable software architecture, RESTful API design, and microservices. I'm passionate about creating robust, efficient, and well-structured solutions that meet the highest quality standards.

positions.title: Full Stack Developer
positions.description: As lead developer at Pedbox S.A.S, I spearheaded the creation of a comprehensive business management system from scratch. Designed the architecture and implemented all modules including: appointment scheduling, multi-branch management, custom roles, client portal and advanced dashboard. Built a responsive system with complex integrations (custom SMTP) and statistical reporting. This project, one of my greatest professional achievements, demonstrated my ability to handle complex systems at production scale.

positions.title: Full Stack Developer (API Lead)
positions.description: Led the design and implementation of API architecture for enterprise systems, implementing JSON:API standard with advanced filters, pagination, and query optimization. As the lead developer of the React Native mobile application, I established the technical and architectural foundations of the project. Implemented innovative solutions for complex offline/online data synchronization challenges and significantly improved performance of existing APIs. Collaborated closely with the product team to define technical requirements and establish development best practices.

positions.title: Full Stack Developer (Professional Internship)
positions.description: Designed and developed a comprehensive collections module that managed all sales from advisors and points of sale, improving performance by 75%. Implemented a complete system for tracking company assets with real-time monitoring. Developed robust REST API services that enhanced communication between different system components. Optimized critical processes by implementing message queues and distributed cache, reducing response times by 60%.

positions.title: Frontend Developer
positions.description: Led the optimization of the geolocation system for the La Rebaja project, achieving an 80% improvement in speed and accuracy. Implemented automated interface testing that reduced reported production bugs by 40%. Developed reusable VTEX IO components that accelerated new store development by 30%. Contributed to the design of scalable frontend architectures for e-commerce applications.

items.title: Cryp Wallet - Virtual Cryptocurrency Wallet
items.description: Virtual cryptocurrency wallet that allows buying, sending, exchanging, and receiving cryptocurrencies securely and efficiently. I developed both the frontend and backend of this application, implementing JWT authentication, transaction management, and an intuitive interface. The system uses Docker for containerization and PostgreSQL as the main database.

items.title: Agendarte - Enterprise Management System
items.description: Complete enterprise management system developed as the core solution for Pedbox S.A.S. As lead developer, I spearheaded the creation of this platform from scratch, designing the architecture, implementing all modules, and deploying to production. This project represents one of my greatest professional achievements, featuring: • Comprehensive appointment scheduling • Multi-branch management • Professional and service administration • Custom roles and permissions • Client-facing public portal • Advanced admin dashboard • Complete business configurations • Fully responsive system • Custom SMTP integration • Advanced reporting and statistics. Due to company privacy policies, I cannot share public links or source code, but I'm available to discuss technical details in personal interviews. This project demonstrated my ability to handle complex systems at production scale.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's talk!
contact.connectDescription: I'm always open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Feel free to contact me to discuss how we can work together.
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully.
contact.defaultMessage: Hello! I'm interested in your work and would like to discuss a possible collaboration.
contact.errorMessage: There was a problem sending your message. Please try again.

errors.name: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.message: Message must be at least 10 characters
